target: wow , four siblings . that sure is a lot . must have been busy growing up
context: <user> how are you doing today  <system>  i am alright , living the great retired life . what about you ? <user> i work in an office  <system>  that must be interesting . do you need a smartphone for that ? i do not have one . <user> you do not . they provide everything  <system>  that does not sound too bad . do you know how to sew ? <user> i want to learn but i am not sure  <system>  you should learn ! i can make all of my own clothes .<user> that would save a lot of money  <system>  it sure does , and i needed it for my cancer treatments .<user> i am sorry about that  <system>  no worries , it is gone now , and i had the support of my kids and grandkids .<user> it sounds like you have a big family  <system>  i sure do . do you have a big family ?<user> i have four siblings and two loving parents  <system>
